hero.description: Yousef Al-Louji Trading Establishment - We provide digital transformation solutions, smart software development, and custom application design to help businesses grow in the digital age.

about.title: About
about.visionText: Yousef Al-Louji Trading Establishment is a startup founded with an ambitious vision to provide innovative technological solutions that meet the needs of the Syrian market. We focus on digital transformation, smart software development, custom application design, and comprehensive technical services that help companies, organizations, and factories with creative solutions efficiently.
about.missionText: Since our launch in Damascus, we strive to be the trusted partner in the world of technology, with a team of experienced programmers and engineers. We believe that technology is the key to success in the digital age, and we work to provide solutions that meet the highest standards of quality and performance.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: We provide a comprehensive suite of integrated technical services to cover all your digital transformation and technological development needs
services.ctaTitle: Ready to Start Your Technical Project?
services.ctaDescription: Contact us today to discuss your requirements and provide you with the ideal technical solutions that suit your business needs and ensure your success in the digital age

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: We're here to answer your inquiries and provide customized offers. Don't hesitate to contact us for any inquiry or to start your next project.
contact.addressValue: Syrian Arab Republic - Damascus - Abou Rummaneh
contact.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your requirements or inquiry...
contact.sendingNote: Messages are sent via WhatsApp and we will respond as soon as possible
contact.directContactDesc: For quick inquiries, you can contact us directly via WhatsApp
contact.successMessage: Thank you for contacting us! We'll get back to you soon.

errors.nameTooShort: Name must be at least 2 characters
errors.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
errors.messageTooShort: Message must be at least 10 characters
